content.detailedDescription: I was travelling north with my daughter on 196 and 31... 4 miles north of i94. we saw a mrror like sphere with protruding legs at 45 degree angle. the objext ascended gradually, moved to the east, then descended in a s shape motion. the object then vanished. the sighting lasted about 2 minutes.
content.summary: object was a bright, mirror like sphere with legs protruding at a 45 degree angle.Object ascended then descended then vanished

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday night my wife and i where out side just looking at the night sky relaxing. my wife looking out over the tree tops, said look at that nice bright star. we where just starring at it,and i told her that wasn't there last night. looking at the light i noticed that it was moving up and down. i walked inside grabbed the camera and took pictures.
   watching it for two hours the lights suddenly.The lights on the object went out. the next night went to the same spot no light. i took a picture in the same location. the object lite up move about 8 miles stopped and stayed there for about 2 hour and the light went out didn't see it anymore.
content.summary: Nice bright light turning to a red-orange light moving up and down, but staying in the same area for over two hour s.

content.detailedDescription: Initially when i first noticed it, it was a streak of light above a cloud bank i thought it may have been a contrail caught in the sunlight or something atmospheric so i didn���t pay any attention to it even thought it was completely stationary it didn���t cross mind at all, until i took another look, at that point it was partially transparent but still stationary, i yelled out to my partner and my friend and we watched it for a while (my partner was taking photos of it). it gradually began to resemeble a star but it was so far away we had trouble identifying it without camera zoom assistance, we took 11 photos some of which the object we observed seemed to change shape, opacity, orientation and position in the sky. in the last photos we took before it went behind the clouds were clear enough that you could see that the object was spherical in shape and had a shadow underneath it also had a sort of disturbance around it. the object was observed north west of my apartment and was viewed from my apartment window. i have observed similar things in the sky 5 times over the last few years this is the second time during daylight hours (once in the morning and once in the evening). the camera lens had a spec of dust on it which is apparent in the photos but in no way does it obscure the view of the object
content.summary: Object appeared as steak of light then changed opacity/shape/orientation, then disapeared behind clouds

content.detailedDescription: I was out back smoking a cigarette before bed, watching the night sky.  beyond the tree tops, a gold object came into view.  immediately i thought it look similar to a satellite, just moving a bit faster.  the object had a direct path across the sky.  it was much higher than a plane can go and much much larger also.  as it passed over head, i could make out an elongated triagular head piece with a large blinking light on the top.  there appeared to be separation and a cube coming off the back of the triangle.  it looked like some type of space station, but i found that the space station doesn't have lights. this object absolutely had a large blinking light on the front.  the best description i can give to the overall experience is a "space station missile".  i believe this was a man made object just because of the flight path and steady blinking light.  whatever it was, it was large.
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Cone,   Square,   Rectagular,   Triangle
content.summary: Strange blinking object - satellite? space station?

content.detailedDescription: I woke up at 5:15 am mst and looked outside of the huge windows in our log cabin off of cr 5 in fraser, colorado.  the skies were totally clear within my line of sight, and i saw what appeared to be a plane...Blinking red and green lights in the distance.  i didn't think anything of it until i realized i was watching the object for 5 minutes and it hadn't moved. i got dressed and went to the porch, where i continued to observe this object for another hour.  the object barely moved from its location, except for short, abrupt movements up and down and sideways.  there was virtually no wind, and the trees and the frame of our roof were the reference point for watching this object that never really changed position...Only jutted around side to side and up and down in the sky over the continental divide of northern colorado.  as the sun rose, i watched this object slowly propel upward until it was no longer visible because of its tiny size in the far distance, and the rising of the sun.
content.summary: Ufo in southern sky above the continental divide in northern colorado

content.detailedDescription:
my husband and i were night sky watching from the pavement of famoso raceway at 10:30pm, august 27th, 2011. the camp area was very dim and very quiet. out of my peripheral view i caught a glimpse of movement up to my right. my 1st thought, geese... v-shaped, point in front, traveling straight at the speed of ,(my second thought) those strobe lights for events... however it was not connected to a ray of light nor did it have a tail. i distinctly recall the "surface" or the viewable mass to have "v's" almost like shoe treads, which i couldn't honestly say if it was surfaces (plural) of many ufos in formation or if it was a detailed pattern surface of a singular object. 
there were absolutely no lights. it appeared to glow, or reflect soft, dull light, from its distinct v patterns, assumingly from the ground below it as it passed.
it was quick, maybe 5-10 seconds and seen almost better peripherally. as it headed straight out in front of us, we quickly got adjusted to see the shape better defined hopefully...And it was just gone! we dont know if it turned directionally or just disappeared. almost as if we looked at it dead on! and it was no longer viewable! the notion that we just saw something we weren't suppose to see. 
   we stayed up discussing it a while and waiting for it's return...But had to sleep by 12:30am and nothing report worthy was noted.
content.summary: Caught in my peripheral  appeared to be geese,no sound, no lights. then appeared to be a strobe light with no light rays..? almost translucent with a dull reflective surface.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife an i had stepped outside to smoke a cigarette ,we were looking up as it was a clear night with a few high level clouds grey in color as we had been in a extended amount of 100 plus degree weather days we commented to each other it was cooler and the stars were clear tonight.
just as i looked straight up asked my wife if she was seeing a triangular shaped craft , and she stated yes with lights on each corner and i said yep.
the craft was what seemed to be around 5,000 feet up was moving south at a fairly low speed ,my wife turned off the porch light and we got a fantastic view of it,but waas soon blocked by the neighbors tree so we stepped out past our garage to better see it i told her to run get the oldest boy cause nobody is gonna belive what we were seeing she ran inside and i stayed out to keep a eye on it she soon returned and had a flashlight as its pitch dark outside our garage...So i grabbed the flashlight and aimed it at the craft and flashed it a few times real quick.....Wow this thing spun around bout 45degrees and made a bright white flash, the wife commented to me dont do that again,i asked why cause she said i didnt know what i was messing with and i agreed as the craft started comming back the opposite way in our direction and i could tell my wife was upset and i said it would be fine,the craft seemed to lose some altitude during this event and its direction of travel was now north we continued to watch it and as it got past us made another turn and headed off in a westerly direction untill we could no longer see it.We both commented to each other seen it as no one would proabably belive us .
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Black triangle craft with bright points of light on each corner.

content.detailedDescription: I was fishing on shore behind mcdonalds when i noticed the object out over lake superior.  it was kind of light bulb shaped, but its profile changed as it sat there.  it appeared to be possibly spinning?  more flat on one side than another.  light bulb, saucer, but up and down perpendicular to the ground, not hovering like a usual saucer.  it just sat there for about 15-20 minutes.  i tried taking pictures but it was just too small to see.  i looked away for a brief moment, and when i looked back up, it was gone.  it was weird because there weren't very many clouds in the sky, it was definitely too dense to be a cloud itself.  it was too far away to get a real good observation of it.  what stood out the most about it is that it was absolutely not moving in any one direction.  it was above the same building the entire time, it didn't get larger or smaller or anything, it just hung out there.
content.summary: Balloon shaped, hovering object over lake superior

content.detailedDescription: Got out of my car at midnight on august 27th 2011, and looked up at the sky.  there were two light green circular lights in a mass of clouds.  at first i thought they were spotlights or a search helicopter, but the more i watched, i realized that there was no sound and no trail from a light to the ground!  my neighbor came home at the same time and looked up to see what i was watching.  she  also couldn't believe what she was seeing.  they started at one end of the cloud (from the west), shot straight out and then one circled to the right and one to the left and then started all over.  this all took place in the cloud.  once the cloud descipated they were gone.  went on for about 15 minutes.  it was almost as if they were playing with each other!  talked to another girl on the 28th and she said she saw the same type of lights at 5 a.M. she lives within 6 or 7 miles from me except in the country.  talked to another man today 8/29 who said he sees them all the time in this part of the country in our town.  told me he quit telling people because they thought he was crazy.  what are we seeing?
content.summary: Round light green lights in the clouds making a straight line and into a circular pattern laste about 15 mins and disappeared when the cloud descipated

content.detailedDescription:
(you tube link moved to investigator field) cms 08/30/11 09:38 cst flg

this video has some adult language.  it is raw, unedited footage from the event.  2 witnesses were present, which will be apparent from the audio.

i would like to commend you on your wonderful changes to the reporting section to the website.  i'm still waiting for you to add the "fake plane" or "holographic plane" to your sighting options.  most ufologists are aware of holographic/shapeshifted planes........

west mankato is a great place to see 50-100 of these per night/given it is clear......Thank you for searching for the truth mufon(or knowing it already, and keeping it tight lipped)
content.summary: Link moved to investigator field cms 08/30/11 flg 09:38cst

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were driving back from lubbock to dallas.  i took a wrong turn in aspermont, tx and went to stamford, tx.  when i realized my mistake we went north on highway 277 towards haskell.  about 1-2 miles south of haskell my friend in the passenger seat said, "look!".  he was leaning forward looking upwards, overhead from my car.  i looked up and saw a large aerial ufo going right over my vehicle from right to left (east to west).  it was over the top of my car and i rolled down my window and slowed down to see what it was.  it was then i realized there was no noise.  the ufo was low enough to be coming in for a landing at a major airport above the end of the runway - less than 500 ft. it appeared.  it was odd shaped, diamond generally with the points in front and back being longated.  there were several lights as i recall - more like orbs - no flickering and they were greenish.  the ufo continued on without hesitating and i continued to slow down and just watch as it got further and further away until it look like a dot, or star in the sky.  there was nothing but farmland on both sides of us.  we had not been drinking, smoking or anything else.  we are businessmen making a business trip. both of us are 55 years old.  what shocked me the most was the silence.  there is no way any type of craft that large, that close to the ground doesn't make noise and there was none.  the craft didn't appear interested in us and even though the area is very remote it didn't seem to be concerned about being seen - it was very dark, craft and the night so we didn't see it until it was upon us.
content.summary: Strange craft, no noise flew over us - size of passenger plane

content.detailedDescription: There were 6 of us at the masons building in telluride colorado at around 10:30 pm, august 28th 2011. we were looking up at the stars, waiting for shooting stars, and watching a lightening storm coming in from the west. we did see a few shooting stars and sheet lightening. we were sitting in a circle, and i was facing north. i saw what looked like a bright shooting star traverse the northern ridge of town. i mentioned it to the others, and we resumed staring at the sky. then, suddenly, i saw what looked at first like a bright shooting star emerge over the same northern ridge. it was traveling at extremely high velocity. it then changed direction at almost 180 degrees, and flew over town, changing directions several times in its flight path. it then disappeared over the north eastern ridge. i couldn't articulate anything than "holy fuck" over and over and over, whilst pointing and tracing its flight path. the others witnessed it too, but i was the only one who saw the rapidity of its change in direction. the distance the object covered and its pattern of flight matched nothing i have ever seen in my life. i was overcome with a sense that i have never felt before. the other people i was with saw the tail end of its flight, but not the entirety of the occurrence. there were 3 males and 3 females, including myself, who witnessed this event. 2 of 3 of the females began laughing. directly after, i was shaking uncontrollably. my friends seemed less affected, but were still at a loss to explain what we had all seen. i couldn't sleep afterward. my world has been altered. the only way to describe this is that i asked (silently, mentally) to see something, and something was shown to me with others present to witness it too. please contact me for any further details. thank you.
content.summary: Object at high velocity changing directions rapidly

content.detailedDescription: Red and green pulsating lights in sky, hovered, moved side to side, and straight up in air. multiple crafts multiple days.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Young cousin noticed a

content.detailedDescription:
(link moved to investigator field) cms 08/30/11 09:47 cst flg
ufo huge triangle disk over fresno ufoattacks kingufokidfresno theufokidfresno ufowizard (name removed) cms flg california. 4.30 a huge bright ufo came accross the sky north to south. very low i saw one huge light i continued to film i then can see 2 bright lighte from the side and back of this fast moving silent craft. camera was sony trv 103 10 times zoom set on night vision. over west coast
content.summary: Bright ufo then i saw 3 or more lights

content.detailedDescription: The object was like a clear orb with and orange glow from within it. about the size of a beach ball. it happened at dusk. it floated above the trees in a straight path going north east. it never rose or fell. little to no wind. it didn't sway or bob around like a balloon. just moved in a straight line until it was out of site. watched in for about 2 to 5 minutes.
content.summary: Watched it float across the complex until it was out of sight

content.detailedDescription:
I shot this picture during my trip to brussels in belgium (see picture for location). it was a nice sunset so, i shot few pictures of it. when i look at them few days after, i saw this weird spot on the bottom left of one of the picture. i don't think this is a cloud because of the orientation, shape and it is a little brighter than the rest of the clouds around. i didn't see a plane, birds or any kind of activity in the sky at the moment i was taking the pictures. i took 6 pictures with an interval of 45 sec to 1 min (approx) and this weird thing appears only on the third picture. i show that picture to some friends and they couldn't give me an answer of what is this.

i hope you can find something of this.

cheers.
content.summary: Wierd objet between the clouds

content.detailedDescription: April 24,2011-12 noon.I was at my kitchen sink, getting a drink when looking out of the window i noticed a silvery white object traveling in the sky slowly from right to left.I recognised this object as i had seen the same thing on the 12 feb,2011.It slowly pulsed a bright white as it moved.As it pulsed it seemed to increase in size and brightness.The pulsing had no discernable rhythm.I would call the shape more of an elipse than a disk.It was steady in flight and did not wobble.When first sighted its size was comparable to a 5p coin at arms length.After observing the object for several seconds i ran to the living room to get my camcorder and then proceeded to the back garden.The object was now hovering in the distance,a little further away than when first seen.I was in the process of trying to film the object when my 10 year old son came out and i pointed out the object to him.As i was trying to focus on the object my wife and daughter allso came outside.This is when the object came much closer and began making strange horizontal movements left and right.We were all in absolute awe as it began darting about in a fast,erratic manner.During this time the camcorder had been running for a couple of minutes but i was unable to focus on the object.Several times the object seemed to totally disapear while we watched it and reapear in a differant part of the sky.I soon realised that trying to capture this moment with the camcorder was a bad idea so i asked my son to fetch my nikon d60 dslr with 200mm lens from the house.As i prepared the dslr i passed the camcorder to my son who allso carried on trying to film it.The object was begining to go back in the direction it first came from as i began taking pictures.To the human eye the object mostly looked like a white,flashing,pulsing elipse which sometimes would blink black for a split second.When i looked at the object through the zoom lens i could see a lot more detail.The object seemed to wobble and vibrate at a very fast rate.For a split second i could see a metallic disc shape then a sphere and allso lots of black flashes and a fuzziness to it.I would best describe it as it seemed to be every shape at the same time because it was flickering and changing so fast.Allso i was shooting in burst mode with manual focus.Several times it disapeared while i was photographing it and it would reapear in another part of the sky.During the time i was taking pics my son complained that he could see the object with his eyes but the camcorder could not pick it up.I eventually took 119 pics which show a lot of details that were not apparent when i was looking at the object.This i think is due to the fast shutter speed of the camera.The object eventually gained height and disapeared behind a neighbours house.Whan i was watching this thing in the sky i was and still am convinced that this was a very unconventional object which showed impossible flight charachteristics and behaviour.I have worked outdoors all my life and planes ,normal aircraft,birds etc are a normal daily sight for me.This was far from normal and to be honest left me in shock for several days after it.
content.shape: Cigar,   Cone,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular
content.summary: A pulsing white object which sometimes flashed a black colour which allso moved in unconventional ways.Pics  63,64,65 show best how the object changed shape,view all pics at100% +

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching videos with my partner and my sister and decided to take a break and go outside for a cigarette. first noticed things were strange that there was no sound or wind at all outside, no bird noise or car noise. then i look up to the sky towards the ocean (1.5 kms from house) when i notice two bright lights travelling at high speed together in a northerly direction.

this is when my heart started racing because the lights were brighter than any plane an the speed was faster than any plane as well. it was at this point after 5 seconds of viewing when the two objects suddenly did 180 degree turns at the same constant speed they had been travelling at before. the strange thing is that they seemed to make the turns in opposite directions, one up and one down. they disappeared behind some trees and thats when i yelled for my partner and sister to come out and have a look.

my sister came out and we couldn't see anything, so i jumped up on my brick fence to get a view of the sky line from a higher elevation. this is probably 1 minute later after the first sighting. i then spotted them much closer together travelling really low in the same direction i had previously seen them travelling north. this means that they must have turned yet again while i was trying to track them again. this time they were travelling even faster and then they joined into one bright light and blinked out of existence. whether they actually disappeared or just went behind some houses on the skyline that obscured my vision, i'm not sure. but after that i could not see them again.
content.summary: Two star like objects travelling together in formation at high speed

content.detailedDescription:
Was in the yard with the dog; rural area, good dark sky conditions.  the sky was cloudless.  saw a very bright (est. -8 magnitude) light almost over-head in eastern sky.  the light disappeared and then re-appeared 4 to 5 seconds later further north.  it disappeared a second time for 8 to 10 seconds, and re-appeared again further north.  it did not re-appear over the next five minutes.

there were no noticeable airplanes in the area and no blinking lights, no sound.  the light did not appear to be aircraft landing lights being turned on and off.  it really appeared most like an iridium flare.  i am quite familiar with them and have observed "double flares" on several occasions.  the first light was easily a -8 magnitude, the second perhaps a -6, and the 3rd maybe a -3.

i check heavens-above daily for satellite traffic and did not recall an iridium flare forecast for the date and time i observed this.  i went back in the house and rechecked heavens-above.  there were no iridium flares projected to occur here last evening at that time--and certainly no doubles.  (i have not heard of any triples?)  i further checked the web site for any other satellite traffic projected for that time last night and found nothing?

please note:  this sighting is quite similar to 31265 from georgia.
content.summary: Very bright light similar to iridium flare; went out and came back on twice.

content.detailedDescription: On the night of march 13 2011 at approximately 11:30 pm at my house in northwest las vegas nevada i opened my back door which faces due north to smoke a cigarette. i stood in my doorway as i usually do and lit my cigarette. after i lit it i took a drag and immediately saw four very large red lights to my left in the western sky. they were approximately 1-2 miles away, 500 feet high (about 40 degrees), pill size, slightly pulsating, completely silent and travelling west (from left to right). the four lights seemed to be seperate objects travelling like a snake, perfectly spaced apart, following one another, taking as much space in the sky as if you held up two pencils in your hands with your arms extended out. i immediately realized that ive never seen anything as big or as fast. i believed i was looking at four possible ufo's. they were moving so fast i knew i didnt have time to grab my phone to record it so i decided to just watch this amazing event. the objects banked left while dropping elevation and began heading north, passing through  a small gap in a mountain range that is about 5 miles away that also goes from west to east. immediately after the last red light was  out of my sight, military jets came from the east and west, travelling side by side in pairs. about a dozen total. they were travelling very fast and were very loud flying back and forth as if they were looking for these objects. i saw the lights for about 10 seconds or so and the jets were in the sky for about 3 minutes and then flew off. i didnt notice any other aircraft while the lights were visible. i truely believe i saw four unidentified flying objects that were bigger and faster than any man made objects that were followed by many military jets that were looking for these objects. i believe the entire event took about 4 minutes.
content.summary: Four large red lights travelling east and silent. banked north while dropping elevation passed through mountain range followed by military  jets.

content.detailedDescription: I actually did not see this creature until later when i took the memory stick out of my camera & put on my computer. and even then i didnt notice it but an old school chum noticed it on the photo on my facebook page. i never even was sure i really believed in aliens. it looks like a gargoyle to me almost. it is facing a fire we had built between our families 2 travel trailers & we did compare against the flames & its is not the flames. this things was right next to me but i did not see it. when we arrived at the sand lake dunes in tillamook there was an odd noise that started that everyone thought was a cat. it was the weirdest experience as all my family & friends have really been unsettled by this photo. i might still have it on the original memory stick if it needs to be analyzed. i have photos of the exact area taken in daylight with nothing there. there is also a blue orb in the photo but orbs are often in my photos. this evening my boyfriend did some photoshopping playing with the lights of the photo & it appears to be solid as the light reflects off of it. there also appears to be some sort of symbols/insignia on the metallic part of the garmet this "alien" is wearing. i am not into aliens at all. in fact, my boyfriend watches so many programs about aliens that im fairly weary of anything having to do with aliens. this is not my field of interest at all. i kept thinking of it as a demon. but in the interests of science & because this does appear to be a genuine...Otherworldly creature, i thought perhaps i should share it. this happened in october of 2010 when i was attending the jeep club races of my boyfriends family.
content.summary: Alien, appears to be wearing metallic garmet w/ symbols

content.detailedDescription: We have seen this same light 3 times in the last 2 weeks. all three times we have seen this light it came up from the same place to the west of us, the first two times the light came straight up and then took off moving north east, then tonight it came up and traveled south east. the light is an orange/white color and is very bright and solid, there are no flashing lights on it just a solid bright the entire time. it will move from side to side quickly while it is moving. i finally got my video camera out this time and we got it on tape for a few seconds, but i don't have any way to put the video on my computer. the first two times we saw it there were about 8 or 9 people here and tonight there were 4 of us that saw it. we see planes and jets fly over all the time, but this is nothing like any of us have seen, also it has never made any noise. tonight there looked like an airplane was flying above it moving in the opposite direction, but the plane must have been flying higher than the object because the plane kept going and then right after that the light just went out like it always does.
content.summary: Bright moving light

content.detailedDescription:
I always observe the skies. on this night there was a perfectly clear sky. i saw a object hovering in the sky and thought it must be a traffic helicopter. i forgot about it, i was enroute to a dunkin donuts a short ride away. so there on my way at a red light here and again, i kept seeing this object in the sky? and i wondered how i was able to keep seeing it thinking i had changed direction in driving.. yet there it was. so at one particular area in pelham manor, ny facing the bronx- i was a traffic light and it was interestingly a very, very long red light. so at this light you could see out and over to the bronx.. and now i could see 2 hovering objects and thought.. okay there must be an accident on one of the highways or parkways? so, i thought to myself again 'eh no big deal' but then it happened. one hovering object (both were 'white' lighted) was on my left, the other one was straight ahead and i was looking at it waiting for the red light to turn.. this is the crazy part and i laugh when i think about it.. this object that i had convinced myself was a helicopter.. "jumped" forward in the sky.. like a 'leap' and it had lept about half the distance between where the object was and where i was so it was much closer now.. so i leaned my head forward and said a few curse words like 'wtf' did i just see? i put my car in park, opened the door and stood up then the lights went off.. but i could see its shape still in the sky but its lights were off and it passed directly over my head.. lights off and i looked directly up at it.. here is the description.. it was a trinagle and it had shapes and designs on it.. it looked like a plane (which shocked me because that meant something like a plane was hovering?) much later on i wondered if the object was able to change shapes ie., helicpoter, airplane? sounds crazy.. anyway one of the triangle's tips was where the cockpit of a plane would be and the other two tips came out like the wings.. then there was a long extension coming out of the back of the trinagle as if to mimic the shape of a long plane with a tail like an airplane had.. as it went over my head i saw it put the lights back on.. it was the craziest and weirdest thing i have ever seen with my own two eyes in my whole life! don't know what to think of it at all. and i just continued on to get my coffee. 

if interested i will draw a sketch... i didn't have my cellphone on this night.. of course?
content.summary: Faux-airplane- hovered, disappeared, reappeared

content.detailedDescription: Please call me.....
content.summary: Series of lights that come from south, turned to east, reminded me of chineese paper bags

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i went outside, i looked up andimmediately noticed an object moving very quickly in the sky. at first i thought it was a satellite, but as i looked i noticed that it had no defined edges and was moving too quickly. also i have not ever seen a red satellite.

i urged my friend to take a look and we both witnessed it move across the sky. my friend saw it change direction, moving in a non-ballistic manner, travelling faster than anything we have seen in the night sky.

both my friend and i were puzzled as we watched the object move across the sky. it moved left, and then back to the right, and the disappeared beyond the horizon.
content.summary: Reddish triangular blur in atmo, moving very rapidly e to w

content.detailedDescription: I was walking out of my building just happened to look up and i saw what i at first thought was a really bright star.  i was facing east and saw this very bright white light in the sky.  it disappeared then moved north pulsated bright again faded out and i didnt see it again.  i literally could not believe what i was seeing.  i was jaw dropped.  i spent 10 years in the military 6 of those as an aviation electrician ive never seen anything in the sky like that before.  i am also in close proximity to dobbins afb i know aircraft.  my phone was at the pool which is where i was walking to. by the time i realized what i was seeing i ran to get my phone to try and get a picture but was gone by then.  i am definitely a tad disturbed by what i saw because i cannot find a logical explanation for what i saw.  jupiter is close to the same position but is not visible until much later in the evening.  i know what i saw, but i cannot find a logical reason.
content.summary: Bright light pulsated disappeared then reappeared in another spot got bright and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was standing my deck having cigarette about 50 min after standing i saw bright hoving object and a long beam light pick up my cat the diapearedreapeared ared
content.summary: Round and reflective

content.detailedDescription: Saw a light in the sky observed by me and someone else. sighted from the eastside of indianapolis, indiana. i was outside looking at the stars when i saw what at first glance i thought was a airplane. when i looked closer in relation to stars in the sky this object appeared to be further out than the stars. the object was  on a south to north flight path and seemed to speed up and slow down and also weaved from side to side. the object kept on this path until it was completely out of view. there where also airplanes in the sky to reference from. i'm not saying this was a alien craft or anything like that just something not usually seen. i wanted to make this post to see if someone else saw anything similar or to maybe be able to explain to me what this is. thank you for your interest.
content.summary: Strange moving light very high in sky

content.detailedDescription:
(names and ages removed)cms 08/30/11 10:14 cst flg and myself, age 58 were outside in my backyard enjoying the evening at approximately 2000 hours. sky conditions were "severe clear".
out of the three of us i am the most qualified observer. i am a multi engine private pilot with thirty years of experience around most types of aircraft, military and otherwise. 

dana and i were in the hot tub while genara was taking in the dinner dishes. as genara approached the back door of the dwelling she stopped and start to urgently call my name. there was obvious distress in her inflection and i bolted to her side, where she pointed up and to the south from our location saying "look". i initially observed three objects located approximately thirty degrees above the horizon and what appeared to be between four to six miles away. the objects were traveling obliquely to my position from ssw to nne. after several moment i shook off the amazement and called for my camera and binoculars. approximately ninety seconds later i was brought my requested items. during this period the lead object stopped illuminating. several others appeared fully illuminated stretched out in a line that was varied in lateral and horizontal position. there was no sound. the objects all had the same configuration. the illuminated shape was like a clear sphere approximately 50-90 feet diameter. the illumination was accomplished by what appeared to be a solid bar of light that resembles a flattened out letter "w". it changed color at times. bright orange on a couple of them yellowish on others. during their approach the last three trailing objects swept wide to the west before turning to the east unlike the lead objects. the illumination was not navigational lighting. the were no red/green white or strobes. i took several still pictures with a kodak digital camera and then switched modes and attempted to make two short videos using the same camera. the images are poor but do depict the lighting and the formation. the objects speed was very slow from my perspective. at times one or two objects seemed to be in a hover before continuing to the east. i switched over to a set of nikon monarch 10 x 56 6 degree binoculars. the oversized primary lens' are optimum for low light conditions. i tracked the last three of the objects. each of the last three illumination stopped while i was viewing them through the binoculars. i could still see the objects in some way even more clearly then when illuminated. the silhouette was bottom 4/7ths of a sphere with a slightly conical structure on top. this structure was centered on top and fell short of reaching either edge by 1/5th of the top distance of the shape. they continued on to the east until they appeared so low on the horizon that they became obscured by my neighbors roof line. i have not heard a single report on the local news as of today. i am glad i have witnesses i can speak with about this event.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Toy top shaped

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog in the field across the street from my home.  i always take my night vision goggles with me to look at the stars when it's a clear night.  i'm looking up maybe 80*, when i see what i think is a satellite, you can see them sometimes when sun light reflects off them.  they appear to be a star, but moving, not a meteor, not a plane. just moving high up, in their orbit.
this was very high, i didn't hear anything, it was moving from north to south, stopped, this was when it really got my attention, since satellites do not stop!!! it turned right 90* then moved a little, then did another 90* turn almost in an instant!!  it was then moving in a south to north heading. it began picking up speed, then accelerated so fast, it had to be going thousands of mph, no plane could have done this, that fast.  i could not see this with the naked eye, only with the night vision goggles.  this happened at 10:10pm est.  over east north carolina. wilmington area.  was not a plane, not a satellite, not a meteor.  
i was in the army, a scout, i've never seen something like this before. it was an object, under control, stopped, turned 90*, twice, then put on speed like something in the movies.  
when i first noticed it, i thought it was a satellite, like i see often, then when it stopped, turned, turned again, in such a way, 90*, then pick up speed like a rocket engine, even more, soooo fast, then it was out of sight.
content.summary: Light, path, stop quickly, turned 90*, turned another 90*, picked up speed, then accelerated to probably thousands of mph, like nothing i've ever seen,
